title: Question 11: Why I can’t  log on the local maintenance webpage of HG？
answer:
(1) Make sure that the physical connection between the computer and HG works well.
(2) Check whether the computer configured with correct IP address or not. We suggest you configure the computer with DHCP mode for
gaining IP address automatically.
(3) The computer has to be configured with one IP address selected from 192.168.1.2/28~192.168.1.14/28 if you hope to configure the
computer with a static IP address manually.
(4) Make sure that the computer configured without Proxy Server.
